outline:
1. to be shattered, be dismayed, be broken, be abolished, be afraid
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be shattered, be broken
      2. to be dismayed
    2. (Niphal) to be broken, be dismayed
    3. (Piel) to be shattered, be dismayed, be scared
    4. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to be dismayed
      2. to dismay, terrify
      3. to shatter
kjv_def: abolish, affright, be (make) afraid, amaze, beat down, discourage, (cause to) dismay, go down, scare, terrify.
strongs_def: properly, to prostrate; hence, to break down, either (literally) by violence, or (figuratively) by confusion and fear
